channel.title: concept on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in concept on MillMint

item.title: Out of The Ground and Into The Light
item.description: Archived from the original article here NO REALTORS EXCEPT THE STATE â– THE COUNTY THE AGENT OF THE STATE â– THE ARCHITECT THE AGENT OF THE COUNTY It is clear that in Vekllei democracy is a way of living more than it is a form of government. After all, by metrics of representation, the Atlantic nation’s electoral system often sputters and fails, undermined by the bundling of the human and natural votes as equal, and the wildly disproportionate borough system.

item.title: City / Forest Living
item.description: Archived from the original article here In Vekllei’s vast interior, there are large areas of uninhabited land designated as off-limits terra nullius. This is kronaismioudelfia, or “crown land,” named for the Upen’s perception of all living creatures as god-kings rather than Vekllei’s historical monarchy. It is very important to make a distinction between the modern nation-state and Vekllei’s preconception of itself. This is a forced pacifism hoisted upon themselves, a disciplined fear integral to the deeper psychospiritual intuition within Upen.

item.title: How to Speak Vekllei, and A New Website
item.description: Archived from the original article here For all you’ve seen of Vekllei and her characters, you’ve never heard a single one of them speak. This post marks a little exploration into the Vekllei language, and a ‘soft launch’ of my website, https://millmint.net. The proper launch will come at the end of the month. This post will briefly discuss some elements shown in this infographic, but a large article on the language has been drafted here.

item.title: Petrol Heaven â€” The Rohsm STR-750
item.description: Archived from the original article here ðŸŒ¼ Featured in the Atlantic This article appeared in Issue #6 of the Atlantic Bulletin. You can read it here. The Rohsm STR series is a small racer built for clubs by Rohsm S.p.M., a hundred-year-old company headquartered in the Mediterranean racing culture of Tohs. Its most recent variant, the 750, is available in limited quantities to enthusiast owners and club pools.

item.title: Meet Tzipora â€” concept panel for a Vekllei comic
item.description: Archived from the original article here ðŸŒ¼ Featured in the Atlantic This article appeared in Issue #3 of the Atlantic Bulletin. You can read it here. Unique among girls # There are a lot of things Tzipora does differently to everybody else, and they start to make a lot more sense when you realise Tzipora either does not realise she is unusual, or does not care.
